Project.shortdesc: The JISC in partnership with The Wellcome Trust and the U.S. National Library of Medicine have joined forces to digitise the complete back files of a number of important and historically significant medical journals. The digitised content will be made freely available on the internet via PubMed Central (http://www.pubmedcentral.gov). The funding of £1.25 million (£750,000 from the Trust, £500,000 from the JISC) will digitise around 1.7 million pages of complete back files.
Project.name: Medical journal backfiles
